author: IGN
description:
The Mafia series has returned with a prequel set in early 20th century Sicily. And while it’s a much more focused adventure than Mafia 3, there are still some helpful tips we were able to squeeze out of this delicious Sicilian lemon. Here are 6 important tips for Mafia: The Old Country.

Timecodes:
00:00 - Intro
00:19 - Don't Waste Your Money
01:02 - Take the Time to Loot
01:24 - Prioritize Knife Durability
02:19 - You Can Shoot Trinacria
02:38 - Use Explore Mode to Find Collectibles
03:31 - Short Shotguns Can Be Sidearms

#IGN #Gaming
title: Mafia: The Old Country - Essential Tips and Tricks

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Another game has fallen victim to Microsoft's cost-saving measures. Avalanche's Contraband, which the public hasn't seen anything of, depsite being announced with a teaser trailer back in 2021, has been put on hold, and judging by Xbox's recent track record with in-development games, it doesn't look good. Contraband was supposed to be an open-world co-op game from the developers of Just Cause, but aside from the aforementioned teaser, we saw nothing of it. The game has joined the likes of Perfect Dark and Everwild as long-in-development Xbox titles that will now no longer see the light of day. In Sony news, the PS5 has just shipped 80 million units worldwide, and is on track to overtake the PS3 in overall sales. But it has a long way to go to catch longtime sales leader, the PlayStation 2, with more 160 million units sold (not just shipped). And speaking of Sony, the company is admitting that their live-service plans haven't gone according to plan, after the fail
title: Xbox Stops Work on Contraband After Four Years of Development - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Shaping Your Parks trailer where you will learn how to sculp grand visionary parks, mould the land and lakes, and design waterfalls to create perfect environments for your dinosaurs and guests. Building upwards or downwards and even moving mountains is surprisingly easy with the tools available. 
With all these tools, you can create beautiful natural enclosures and spectacular sights within your parks.
Jurassic World Evolution 3 will be available on PC (Epic Games Store, Steam, and Windows PC), PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S on October 21, 2025.

author: IGN
description:
IGN, Konami Digital Entertainment, and Laced Records have delved into the fog to bring the haunting soundtrack for Bloober Team’s Silent Hill 2 to vinyl. The game’s composer, Akira Yamaoka joined us to reflect on the legacy of Silent Hill 2’s soundtrack and commemorate the release of the vinyl.
Pre-order the Silent Hill 2 vinyl by heading over to store.ign.com. The vinyl releases November 25th on two, black heavyweight LPs with 27 tracks from the 2024 remake of this iconic survival horror game.
title: Composer Akira Yamaoka Reflects on Returning to Silent Hill 2 23 Years Later

author: IGN
description:
The Piano Killer is the latest, wickedly fun and unhinged teaser from Eli Roth’s new horror studio, The Horror Section. 

Created alongside longtime collaborator, Jeff Rendell (Thanksgiving), the trailer follows in the footsteps of their original Thanksgiving teaser, which famously morphed into a cult-favorite feature. The Piano Killer may be hinting at a similarly blood-soaked future.

The full cast members list includes: Hailey Kittle, Eli Roth, Jeff Teravainen, Russell Yuen, Tomaso Sanelli, Jonathan Craig, Leah Sharp, Joe Delfin

The Piano Killer trailer will be showing exclusively in theatres when purchasing a ticket to watch Jimmy and Stiggs — a 16mm fever dream from director Joe Begos and the first release under The Horror Section banner, in theatres nationwide starting August 15. Tickets can be purchased here:  https://www.iconicreleasing.com/events/jimmy-and-stiggs/ 

ABOUT THE HORROR SECTION: The Horror Section is the independent studio from iconic horror filmmaker Eli Roth p
title: THE HORROR SECTION: The Piano Killer - Official Trailer (2025) Eli Roth, Hailey Kittle

The film stars Rebekah Kennedy, Ranen Navat, Sean O’Bryan, Susan Gayle Watts, Emily Goss, AJ Bowen, and Sean Whalen. Director Pierre Tsigaridis' Traumatika opens in theaters via Saban Films on September 12, 2025.

Herdling is a brand new adventure from Okomotive, creators of the atmospheric and acclaimed FAR games, and Panic, publishers of Firewatch.

Head out on a grand alpine expedition with a herd of loveable beasts, as you ascend a mountain path, encounter eerie dangers and surprising obstacles, and forge your way to the mystery at the summit. author: IGN
description:
With its second of three games in 2025, developer Obsidian has another banger on its hands with Grounded 2 that just hit early access on Xbox and PC. 

It's the sequel to the original Grounded that fully launched in 2022 to critical acclaim, and it's off to a great start with expanded RPG elements and a new story even if it still has some growing pains to sort out. It's playable now and available for Game Pass Ultimate subscribers.

#IGN #Xbox #GamePass #Grounded2 #Obsidian #Avowed #TheOuterWorlds2
title: Grounded 2 Early Access Hits the Ground Running - Unlocked Clips

author: IGN
description:
Wednesday was reportedly one of Netflix’s most-watched series ever in its first season, and it's clear the streaming giant considers it one of their heavy hitters now, with Season 2 added to the small group of scripted series popular enough to have their seasons split up. But can the three year break between seasons lead to an improvement or will it still feel like a bunch of fun visuals in search of a stronger story?

Season 2 follows Jenna Ortega carrying the show as Wednesday Addams along with a great cast to fill out the rest of the Addams Family, played by Luis Guzman, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Fred Armisen and guest stars Steve Buscemi, Haley Joel Osment and 90s Addams Family cast member Christopher Lloyd.
title: Wednesday Season 2: Part 1 Review

description:

author: IGN
description:
Directed by Christopher Leone (Parallels), CODE 3 is a high-octane action dramedy that follows a world-weary paramedic on his final 24-hour shift as he trains his eager but inexperienced replacement. What begins as a routine night quickly unravels into a chaotic, citywide odyssey, testing their endurance, instincts, and sense of humor as they race from one emergency to the next. 
Blending heart, irreverent comedy, and edge-of-your-seat action, CODE 3 offers a gritty, behind-the-scenes look at the life of first responders, where every call could mean disaster or redemption. 
Rainn Wilson, Lil Rel Howery, and Aimee Carrero lead a dynamic ensemble, joined by Rob Riggle (21 Jump Street) and Yvette Nicole Brown (Community), bringing both heart and levity to the chaos.
title: Code 3 - Official Green Band Trailer (2025) Rainn Wilson, Lil Rel Howery
